channel.title: trading on Nathan Barta
channel.description: Recent content in trading on Nathan Barta

item.title: HackNC 2022
item.description: HACKNC2022 A few weeks ago I had the chance to participate in HackNC 2022. I chose the financial track. What I built Tempest is a manager for trading algorithms. Basically, it is an abstraction between the systems for placing orders on the exchange, and your trading algorithms. I made this because when I used to run trading bots, it was very annoying to manage them. With Tempest you can write trading algorithms in whatever language you want & not worry about how their signals get turned into trades.
